debugSelectTypeSimple.de_de: Einfaches SELECT, ohne UNION oder Subqueries
debugSelectTypeSimple.en_en: Simple SELECT (not using UNION or subqueries)

debugSelectTypeUnion.de_de: Second or later SELECT statement in a UNION
debugSelectTypeUnion.en_en: Second or later SELECT statement in a UNION

debugSelectTypeDependentUnion.de_de: Second or later SELECT statement in a UNION, dependent on outer query
debugSelectTypeDependentUnion.en_en: Second or later SELECT statement in a UNION, dependent on outer query

debugSelectTypeDependentSubquery.de_de: First SELECT in subquery, dependent on outer query
debugSelectTypeDependentSubquery.en_en: First SELECT in subquery, dependent on outer query

debugSelectTypeDerived.de_de: Derived table SELECT (subquery in FROM clause)
debugSelectTypeDerived.en_en: Derived table SELECT (subquery in FROM clause)

debugSelectTypeUncacheableSubquery.de_de: A subquery for which the result cannot be cached and must be re-evaluated for each row of the outer query
debugSelectTypeUncacheableSubquery.en_en: A subquery for which the result cannot be cached and must be re-evaluated for each row of the outer query

debugSelectTypeUncacheableUnion.de_de: The second or later select in a UNION that belongs to an uncacheable subquery (see UNCACHEABLE SUBQUERY)
debugSelectTypeUncacheableUnion.en_en: The second or later select in a UNION that belongs to an uncacheable subquery (see UNCACHEABLE SUBQUERY)
